constructor-arg.value: # Set the target catalog version $productCatalog=$CATALOG$ $productCatalogVersionId='Staged' $productCatalogName=FederalMogul Product Catalog $catalogVersion=catalogVersion(catalog(id[default=$productCatalog]),version[default=$productCatalogVersionId])[unique=true]

# ImpEx for Importing Category Classifications into Federal Mogul Store # Macros / Replacement Parameter definitions $classCatalogVersion=catalogVersion(catalog(id[default='federalmogulClassification']),version[default='1.0'])[unique=true,default='federalmogulClassification:1.0'] $classSystemVersion=systemVersion(catalog(id[default='federalmogulClassification']),version[default='1.0'])[unique=true] $class=classificationClass(ClassificationClass.code,$classCatalogVersion)[unique=true] $classSupercategories=source(code, $classCatalogVersion)[unique=true] $classCategories=target(code, $catalogVersion)[unique=true] $attribute=classificationAttribute(code,$classSystemVersion)[unique=true] $unit=unit(code,$classSystemVersion)

# ImpEx for Importing FMPart Classifications #% impex.setLocale(Locale.ENGLISH); # Macros / Replacement Parameter definitions $clAttrModifiers=system='federalmogulClassification',version='1.0',translator=de.hybris.platform.catalog.jalo.classification.impex.ClassificationAttributeTranslator,lang=en

property.value:
#{defaultImpExLanguageHeader} #{defaultImpExCatalogVersionHeader} # Import all Fitment data #UPDATE FMPart;fitments(code);code[unique='true'];corporate(corpcode);$catalogVersion $fitsupercategories=source(code)[unique=true]
$fitcategories=target(code, $catalogVersion)[unique=true]
INSERT_UPDATE FitmentPartRelation;$fitcategories;$fitsupercategories

property.name: impexRow
property.value: ;{2}:federalmogulProductCatalog:Staged;{0};

property.name: header
header
property.value: # Import all federal mogul customer account addresse INSERT_UPDATE Address;owner(FMCustomerAccount.uid)[unique=true];line1;line2;town;region(isocode);postalcode;country(isocode);phone1

property.name: header
property.value: $accountType=ShipTo # Import all federal mogul customer accounts ship-to to sold-to associations INSERT_UPDATE FMCustomerPartnerFunction;code[unique=true];FMTargetCustomerAccount(uid);FMSourceCustomerAccount(uid);fmCustSourceAccountCode(uid);PartnerFMAccountType[default=$accountType]

property.name: header
property.value: # Import all federal mogul sales organization details INSERT_UPDATE SalesOrganization;salesOrgsId[unique=true];soldToAccount(uid);salesOrgCode;salesDivisionCode;salesChannelCode;fmCustAccount(uid)

property.name: header
property.value: # Update the prospect ID with Sold to number UPDATE FMCustomerAccount;taxID[unique=true];uid[forceWrite=true]

property.name: header
property.value: INSERT_UPDATE PartInterchange;uid[unique=true];rawPartNumber;fmrawpartnumber;fmPartNumber;fmcorpcode;fmcorpName;corpCode;corpName;corpType;partNumber;partFlagCode;partTypeCode;partTypeName;partSort;packageQuantity;reboxQuantity
